column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's interesting that you found our Cha Cha Cha to be less flavorful than the Tonkotsu Black. From our experience
column2: most customers have found the opposite to be true. Regardless
column4: if you ever feel that something we offer is not 100% to your satisfaction
column5: just tell your server and we will do everything we can remedy the situation. Also
column6: I have just this evening notified all the servers to readjust how they prepare the Annin Tofu dessert. I agree
column7: they very often add too much whipped cream which can take away from the more subtle almond flavor of the pudding.
